response.overview: In 2027, a pandemic, caused by a deadly virus known as Truci Morbis has forced society into a new normal under martial law as the populas navigates around mandated laws surrounding the wearing of facial masks.  Jeremy Bivins lives his bitter, day-to-day life as a Social Worker for the new government; a top-tier job that provides him with green varient fluid that protects himself from the deadly disease. Dominic Arroyo, his Spanish Interpreter is responsible for translating the communication between Jeremy and families living in lower-tier households.
response.title: Spread
